Articles.Content:
If i can RPM cameras force to render "Internals" layer, only that i need it place them in the internal and rotate them in right direction. But it will be done after all IVAs.

Awesome! That would be the major of getting 'everybody' into RPM. hopefully the 1.1 will assist in the lagging issue with that.

Good luck.

Peace.
Awesome work again. Great job!
Looks... stretched?

Allrighty then. I'll give this one a go looks pretty awsome.

Hope it works good since the only thing stoppping me from playing in IVA is the lack of really good and functional cockpits.

Beautiful!

I don't have much experience with ALCOR, but I'm assuming the atmospheric meter and thermometer stats only work when you actually have a functioning science part that gives you that information, right?
Is it possible to make a 3-kerbal-IVA for a soyuz like HGR or Raidernick? I found nothing with ASET for this pods.

Looks... stretched?

Could be that the FOV was set at a high value to show the displays.

Is it only me or are the action group buttons in the mk1 capsule wrongly placed: the first one is the tenth and the 2nd is the first one and so on.

And also this: can you place the action group buttons on the unused quarterpanels besides the lower 2 mfd's?
I love you, make more please

Is it only me or are the action group buttons in the mk1 capsule wrongly placed: the first one is the tenth and the 2nd is the first one and so on.

And also this: can you place the action group buttons on the unused quarterpanels besides the lower 2 mfd's?

Strange, i cheked it was ok. One minute i will check it.

-----

Checked it, seems ok.

Ok i will place unused action groups soon.

Edited October 27, 2015 by RangeMachine
This looks really amazing! I am looking forward to trying it tomorrow!

But i have this bug:

I set up the action groups and defined the labels for them

But then, inflight:

The action groups are misplaced.

But i have this bug:

I set up the action groups and defined the labels for them

http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/575692318019879798/21925839DB23CF7B392B457F67261BA4E93570EE/

But then, inflight:

http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/575692318019879342/D0052EEF69722B15927DBC784BA2739659268D5A/

The action groups are misplaced.

Man, it's started from 0:

AG0=Action Group 1

AG1=Action Group 2

etc.

- - - Updated - - -

Is it possible to make a 3-kerbal-IVA for a soyuz like HGR or Raidernick? I found nothing with ASET for this pods.

Possible, but after all stock pods

Man, it's started from 0:

AG0=Action Group 1

AG1=Action Group 2

etc.

Strange... i followed the steps from the ALCOR thread: http://imgur.com/a/3bfBV#0

Strange... i followed the steps from the ALCOR thread: http://imgur.com/a/3bfBV#0

Ah sorry its my fault. You are right its my mistake, i will fix it in 10 minutes and add missing ag for mk1 pod

Edited October 27, 2015 by RangeMachine

Ah sorry its my fault. You are right its my mistake, i will fix it in 10 minutes and add missing ag for mk1 pod

Cool -- Thanks for fixing that. They may be designated internally starting with zero, but they're activated 1-to-0 due to the keyboard.
Done! Update in header.

Done! Update in header.

http://i.imgur.com/1czQSQ6.png

Pretty as a picture!
Thanks for the quick fix!
Okay after some testflights I'm amazed! Is probecontrolroom un your list? This would be the besteht thing ever!!!

Love this mod... I've been waiting for something like this for a long time

Simple request...when you have finished doing what you set out to do. Would you consider making Mk1 pod variant using analogue displays similar to the real Mercury pod?

http://www.ninfinger.org/models/pix/mercfig6.gif

Poor quality picture but you get the idea.

Perhaps I am odd but prefer playing with the low tech Mk1 capsule and lander and this would be awesome.

Can't wait to see what is coming next

Love this mod... I've been waiting for something like this for a long time

http://www.ninfinger.org/models/pix/mercfig6.gif

Poor quality picture but you get the idea.

Perhaps I am odd but prefer playing with the low tech Mk1 capsule and lander and this would be awesome.

Can't wait to see what is coming next

Okay, it will be done something like that, but later.

Is it at all possible to add in the parachute arm/deploy/cut buttons? i know alex had these in his ASET pack, and in the ALCOR capsule. would be helpful for those "sticky situations" during a launch abort

Is it at all possible to add in the parachute arm/deploy/cut buttons? i know alex had these in his ASET pack, and in the ALCOR capsule. would be helpful for those "sticky situations" during a launch abort

Yes it possible, but later.

P.S. You can assign actiongroup and add AG1=Parachute to description for example.

Mk1 Inline Cockpit done, update on KerbalStuff. ASET Avionics is now required!

Edited October 28, 2015 by RangeMachine
